name: Cyberpunch (itch)
description:
Cyberpunch

Cyberpunch is a rogue-like game mixed with a platformer, with 2.5D graphics. The main objective of the player is to defeat the final boss through upgrading your characters progressibly while advancing on different types of levels. 

This game ambientation is futuristic with cyberpunk aspects.

To control the character the player has different options to do so by jumping, controll it's falling, attacking and using the player's ability.

-The letter ‘J’ or ‘Left Click’ to attack

-The letter ‘K’ or ‘Right Click” to use the player’s ability, a heal.

-The letters ‘S’ and ‘D’ to move the player.

-To jump simply press ‘W’ or ‘SPACEBAR’

-The letter ‘S’ is used to fall faster during a jump

-The letter ‘F’ is used to interact with the game world and menus.

On each run the player has to collect essence which is key to upgrade the player. There are different types of levels the player can spawn, chosen randomly, so each play is a completely new one. The level gets harder the further apart the player is from the spawn. During this gameplay the objective is to kill the final boss hidden on one of the corners of the level.
